form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Immigrant Visa and Alien Registration Application, Form FS-510 ( (Chines√®-English)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/27/2023 Form FS-510 (Chinese-English) Form Approved. 2-68 Budget Bureau No. 47-R0150. DEPARTMENT OF STATE B APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. ALL questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets. in duplicate using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $5.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. 1. Family name & First name and middle name KANG CHEN Hon-kan 3. Other names used or by which known (If married woman. give maiden name) CHEN Hon-kan S. Fullynamein native alphabet (If Roman Letters not used) 4. Date of birth Age 6. ### Place of birth if Year A Month E Day (Country) (Province) (City or town) 1911 June. 20 66 China Taiwan Taipei 7. # Nationality 8. $1 Sex 9. Marital status * Chinese Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated Male Female 1 * Including my present marriage, I have been married times. 10. Occupation 11. Present address Merchant 85, Po-Ai Road, Taipei, Taiwan. 12. Purpose in going to the 13. United States Name and address of xxife/husband (Give maiden name of wife) Immigrant KANG Lin-shin 85, Po-Ai Rd., Taipei, Taiwan. 14. 15. Names and addresses of children under 21 years of age Person(s) named in 13 and 14(will) )accompany Not Applicable or follow me to the United States. (Cross out words that do not apply) 16. 17. Intended port of entry Length of intended stay (If permanently, so state) Permanently Los Angeles 18. Final address in the United States 19. 9134 Cockatoo Ave. Do you have a ticket to final destination? Fountain Valley, Calif. 92708 Yes 20. 21. Person you intend to join (Give name, address and Name and address of sponsoring person or organization relationship, if any) (If different from 20) Mr. & Mrs. Y. H. Pan(Son-in-Law & daughter) 0134 Cockatoo Ave. Fountain Valley, Ca. 92708 Same as item 20 22. a Personal description 23. Marks of identification (a) name Color of hair (c) Height Black Rfeet 8 +inches (b) e Color of eyes (d) Complexion Brown Fair 24. The following documents are submitted in support of this application Birth certificate Death certificate Evidence of own assets Medical record(s) ... Police certificate(s) Divorce decree Affidavit of support Photographs () Marriage certificate Military record Offer of employment Other (describe) THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
